pkgmetadata.longdescription: # JoelCLUI, the Easiest Way to _Stylize_ Text and Move the Cursor in Python.## Installation```bashpip3 install joelclui```## Demo```pythonimport joelclui as jj.print('2+2=[green]4[/] and 3+3=[bg red]6[/]')j.print('[yellow]Warning. [red][underline]Error[/] [green]Success[/]')j.print('[bg blue][yellow]Colorful[/] Back to normal')j.print('Status: TBD')j.move_up()j.print('[bold]Status: [green]Complete[/]')```Output:![Terminal output image](https://joelgrayson.com/image/software/joelclui/demo.jpg)## StyleWrap one of of the modifiers below in square brackets [] to change the printed text's style.* Text Color * `bold` * `green` * `yellow` * `red` * `blue` * `black` * `orange` * `purple` * `cyan` * `lightgray` * `darkgray` * `pink` * `lightred` * `lightgreen` * `lightblue` * `lightcyan` * `success` * `warn` * `danger`* Background Color * `bg black` * `bg red` * `bg green` * `bg orange` * `bg blue` * `bg purple` * `bg cyan` * `bg lightgray`* Styles * `bold` * `underline`* Fun * `rainbow`* `[/]` removes formatting/clears## Cursor navigationOptional parameter of how many times to move.```pythonj.move_up() #moves cursor up one linej.move_right()j.move_down()j.move_left()j.move_up(5) #Up 5 linesj.clear() #clears screen```
